text: Meijer is an American chain of hypermarkets. There are Meijer stores in Illinois, Kentucky, Michigan, Ohio, and Indiana. Meijer sells other products as well as their own brands. The chain was ranked Number 13 on Forbes' 2011 list of "America's Largest Private Companies". ==References== Category:Companies based in Michigan Category:Supermarkets of the United States Category:1934 establishments in the United States
title: Meijer
